regen.absent_element: situation of skipping the movie when user clicks
regen.new_specification: The movie shall be skipped if the user clicks a mouse button.

regen.absent_element: situation where the user interrupts the movie
regen.new_specification: If the user clicks a mouse button, the introductory movie will stop and the user will be moved to the main menu.

regen.absent_element: user action to skip the movie by clicking the mouse button
regen.new_specification: If the user clicks a mouse button while the movie is playing, the movie will stop and the main menu will be displayed immediately.

label: If a mouse click is received, this component will terminate the movie.
